data.message: Marshall went wrong when he drew the line in the sand with his fans.  Period!  He's entitled to his own opinions and political beliefs... That's what America gives you.  But when you tell people they're either on your side or they're cut off. That's when he became a bigot!  I could care less about Trump. But what I do care about is him trying to force people to think and believe what he does!  Smh

replies.message: Already has all the money he wants from you anyway.
